item.title: About me
item.author: xtiant1@gmail.com (Tiantian Xie)
item.description: Hi, my name is Tiantian Xie (Tientien Hsieh), who is interested in Real-time rendering, Game and Machine/Deep Learning. I was advised by Dr. Marc Olano and received my PhD degree in Computer Science from UMBC in 2021. I currently work at Epic Games as Rendering Programmer. My recent work is focused on adaptive sampling techniques for real-time rendering that can be directly adapted into game engines with low computing and bandwidth overhead.
